system.descriptionText: Wearer can make +0 Tech-Use Test as a Half Action. If Successful they and all allies in 20 metres ignore a number of AP's of Cover equal to the wearer's Perception Bonus + 1 per Degree of Success on Test until the start of the Wearer's next turn.
